alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 12:55PM CST until January 02 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Central Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 200 PM CST. * At 1255 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hartford, or 8 miles northeast of Geneva, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Kinsey, Malvern, Rehobeth, Esto, Madrid, Black, Memphis, Chancellor, Hollis Dairy Road, Kellys Crossroads, Garretts Crossroads, Wilson Mill and Southern Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
